entry.title: Webpage with Pelican
entry.summary:

One day â€¦
entry.content:
I have long been thinking to make my personal website but I do not want to spend too much time on it. I need to focus on content instead of layout and the post help me to remember my old thought as well as my personal networking tool.

One day my colleague recommended P403n1x87/Austin to me and as a habit I also looked up to developer's website and found this awesome website management tool. I know there are better tools elsewhere but this is good enough for me to start my writing.

About how to host pelican on github pages, I refered to

  • https://pages.charlesreid1.com/how-do-i-pelican/Hosting/
  • https://gist.github.com/JosefJezek/6053301

Hope I will enjoy the journey and keep improving myself along the way.
